price: E verás os criminosos nesse dia, aos pares, atados a grilhões.
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
